articles.title: South Korean actress Gong Hyo-jin and singer Kevin Oh confirm relationship - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The pair was spotted together at the wedding of fellow celebrities, Son Ye-jin and Hyun Bin, where Gong was said to have caught the bridal bouquet.
articles.content:
Singer Oh, who is 31, also confirmed the news through a letter on his official fan forum. 
"As you have all been so supportive of me and since I couldn't tell you first, I'd like to be completely ho… [+568 chars]

articles.title: 2022 Grammy Awards: Jon Batiste wins 5 trophies, Olivia Rodrigo bags 3 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelenskyy also appeared during the ceremony in a video message, where he appealed for support for his country.
articles.content: Foo Fighters won three awards on Sunday, but were not in attendance to pick up their trophies following the recent death of its drummer Taylor Hawkins. An extended tribute to Hawkins played before th… [+2412 chars]
